Text:
Here we are, at the start of the New Year again!
This is the Great Ize-athlon...no, the Great
Ize-athlon 2.0!

First, let me introduce our commentators, the top
two performers from the last event! Alpha and Delta!
I'm Alpha, the last winner. Pleased to be here.
Ehehe! I'm the runner-up, Delta!

This year, the Great Ize-athlon 2.0 has been
significantly revamped and made even harder!
It's a multi-participant long-distance race
overcoming numerous challenges!

I'm both excited and anxious to see what challenges
lie ahead...

Remember, straying off course means immediate
disqualification! That said, obstacles and traps are
fair game according to our brutal rules!
It wouldn't be fun without them!

The grand prize this time is the "Heart's Bounty"
rice cake! There are also luxurious prizes for the
other top performers, so give it your all!

(I won't settle for anything but coming in first.
I'm only after the main prize...!)

(There seem to be many therianthropes participating,
but none with physical abilities like Delta's...)

(I should only be wary of Zeta. Seeing how relaxed
she was earlier, I wouldn't be surprised if she's up
to something.)
All participants, please head to the starting line!

(Here we go... I'll get the "Heart's Bounty," and
then Master Shadow will only have eyes for me!)

There are more participants than I expected.
They're no match for us, though.

Yes...and under no circumstances will I lose to you
either.

Oh, you're all fired up. Keep up that energy,
Epsilon.
What?! Y-You seem to be awfully confident...!
(Fine then... I'll win no matter what it takes!)

Oh? Epsilon seems quite motivated. Heheh.
Competition can be a good thing sometimes.
That pussy cat is as annoying as ever!

Is everyone ready? Alright then, take your
positions—
Ready, set, go!
Hyaaaaaahhh!!!
And it's...Epsilon who's off to a good start!

But isn't she going too fast? I'm sure there are
obstacles up ahead...

(I've had a good start, but so far, it's just a
regular marathon. Not what I expected...)

If you space out like that, I'll leave you in the
dust.
Ah! Hey, get back here!

(...No use overthinking things. I'll just have to
run for the finish line—)
...Wait, what's that noise...?
Guess it's not just a regular marathon after all.

Hurry up, Epsilon. You don't want to get caught in
that thing.
That thing...?
...Wh-What the—?! What the heck is that ball?!
N-Not good! It's rolling this way!
I-I'm gonna get hit! Stay away from me!

Looks like this is the first challenge. Be careful,
Epsilon.

I know! Stop worrying about others, and look out for
yourself, Zeta!
